metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17816 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a use-after-free in pp_getline in asm/preproc.c that will cause a remote denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> need to investigate which commit fixed this

criterions.comment: nasm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1').
